text: Èric Cervós Noguer (born 18 May 1999) is an Andorran tennis player. Cervós Noguer represents Andorra at the Davis Cup, where he has a W/L record of 5–16. ==Davis Cup== ===Participations: (5–16)=== {| |-valign=top | {|class=wikitable !Group membership |-bgcolor=#FFFFCC |World Group (0–0) |- style="background:#B0E0E6;" |WG Play-off (0–0) |-bgcolor=#CCFFCC |Group I (0–0) |-bgcolor=#FFCCFF |Group II (0–0) |-bgcolor=#99CCFF |Group III (2–11) |-bgcolor=#FFCC99 |Group IV (3–5) |} | {|class=wikitable !Matches by surface |- |Hard (2–5) |- |Clay (3–11) |- |Grass (0–0) |- |Carpet (0–0) |} | {|class=wikitable |- !Matches by type |- |Singles (2–8) |- |Doubles (3–8) |} |} * indicates the outcome of the Davis Cup match followed by the score, date, place of event, the zonal classification and its phase, and the court surface. {|class=wikitable !Rubber outcome !No. !Rubber !Match type (partner if any) !Opponent nation !Opponent player(s) !Score |- !colspan=7|0–3;
